meta_description: At the Bailey-Matthews National Shell Museum & Aquarium, there are new ways to learn & connect with our community of experts and enthusiasts.
hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit

## Hours

The Museum is open 10am-5pm daily.

The Museum is open until 7:30pm with special programs and admission pricing on January 22, February 19, March 19, and April 16. [Click here for more information.](https://shellmuseum.org/third-thursdays/)

The Museum is closed Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, and New Year’s Day.

## Admission

Adult: $25

Senior (65+), Veteran, Educator,  
First Responder: $20

Youth (12-17), Student: $15

Child (5-11): $10

Under 5, Museum Member, Active Military: Free

Included in the price of admission are daily gallery talks including Keeper Chats (11a.m. and 2p.m.) during which aquarists reveal fun facts about marine life on exhibit, and Touch Pool Talks (3:30p.m.) during which educators share stories about biology and behavior of mollusks.

## Location and Parking

[3075 Sanibel Captiva Road, Sanibel, Florida 33957](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Bailey-Matthews+National+Shell+Museum+%26+Aquarium/@26.4381136,-82.0952496,16z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m6!3m5!1s0x88db3107b9b6c28f:0x69206663e7c67703!8m2!3d26.4381088!4d-82.0926747!16s%2Fm%2F026790y?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDQyOC4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D)

Mailing address: PO Box 1580, Sanibel, Florida 33957

Parking at the Museum is free.

## Museum Store

The Museum Store offers a wide range of island-themed, shell-themed, educational, exceptional, and elegant items for all ages. Jewelry, home décor, books, toys, original work by local artists, and Shell Museum-branded clot...
admission_text:
## Membership

Members are the heartbeat of the Museum, providing essential support for our educational mission and activities and, if they choose, participating in the life of the Museum in a variety of ways.

Benefits of basic Membership levels include:

  * Unlimited free admission
  * Free admission at over [1,400 North American museums and attractions ](https://shellmuseum.org/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/NARM-Winter-2025.pdf)(at Golden Olive and above)
  * Discounted admission at [participating zoos and aquariums](https://shellmuseum.org/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/reciprocity_chart-1.pdf)
  * Free admission for guests (at Golden Olive and above)
  * 20% discount in the Museum Store
  * Invitations to Members-only events
  * Subscription to Museum print and e-mail publications
  * Discounts on program fees (such as lectures and classes)

All Memberships are for one year and include up to**two adults and four children under 18 living in the same household.** Additional benefits accrue at upper levels of Membership (Lion Paw, Junonia, Angel Wing, Friends of the Living Gallery). Please scroll down for details.

With inquiries please call [(239) 347-5114](tel:2393475114) or email [membership@shellmuseum.org](mailto:membership@shellmuseum.org)

Thank you for your Membership support! We hope to see you soon at the Museum.

### Wentletrap

#### $75 annual membership

  * Unlimited free admission for two adults and four children within the same household
  * 20% discount at the Mu...
collections_text:
# A celebration of _shells, mollusks,_  
and _their ecosystems_

**Location**

3075 Sanibel Captiva Rd  
Sanibel, FL 33957

**Hours**

10am-5pm Daily.

## Featured Exhibits

Explore highlights of the Museum’s collection of nearly 600,000 shells and see over 60 species of marine life.

## [Great Hall of Shells](https://shellmuseum.org/exhibits/great-hall-of-shells/)

## [Living Gallery of Aquariums](https://shellmuseum.org/exhibits/living-gallery-of-aquariums/)

## Things To Do

Enjoy talks, beach and nature walks, classes, community science projects, and more to learn about shells and the amazing animals that make them.

## [Field Education](https://shellmuseum.org/learn-and-experience/field-education/)

## [Lectures](https://shellmuseum.org/learn-and-experience/lectures/)

## Shells & Science

Resources and research on shells, mollusks, related marine life, their habitats, and conservation.

## [Southwest Florida Shells Guide](https://shellmuseum.org/shells-and-science/shells-guide/)

## [Curator’s Corner](https://shellmuseum.org/blog/)

## What’s On

### Special Exhibitions

In addition to permanent exhibits of shells and aquariums, the Museum offers changing special exhibitions throughout the year. From shells to science to conservation and culture, there’s always something new to see. Browse to learn more.

[ Click to learn more ](https://shellmuseum.org/exhibits/special-exhibitions/)
